commitResults.messageBody: store text and display back to user when requested
task can be mark as done or unmark as not done
add support for tracking 3 types of tasks: Todo, Deadline, Event

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor handleMarkCommand and handleUnmarkCommand into modular methods.
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extracted task number parsing into a separate method `extractTaskNumber()`.
- Moved task status updating logic into a new method `changeTaskStatus()`.
- Updated `handleTaskStatusChange()` to orchestrate the task marking and unmarking process.
- Improved code readability, maintainability, and adherence to the Single Responsibility Principle.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Task class to abstract and update CodeCatalyst for compatibility
commitResults.messageBody:
- Made Task an abstract class and updated subclasses (Todo, Event, Deadline) to implement toString method appropriately.
- Removed direct instantiation of Task in CodeCatalyst.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor input handling to use switch-case for improved readability.
commitResults.messageBody:
- Replaced if-else statements with a switch-case structure for handling user commands.
- Preserved functionality for all valid commands (bye, list, mark, unmark, todo, deadline, event).
